short_desc: Add time-based conditional support to mod_ifsession
Add finer control to HideFiles
Ability to apply multiple different quota types (user, group, etc) to session
Remove ftpshut and the /etc/shutmsg file
ProFTPD does not gracefully handle paths changed outside of the session process
prxs should be able to handle modules which have their own configure scripts
add local DNSSEC validation
Support configurable DNS resolution timeouts in mod_wrap2
Check FIFO log file descriptor for writability
Low TransferRate leads to client timeouts
Ability to stop/start proftpd without killing existing connections
Problems using RewriteMap with a FIFO
Support new command-line option for displaying host information
Support per-directory/file recipients for ftpmail notifications
Have build/release process properly set up spec file for cvs/rc/gold builds
TLSCryptoDevice integration with HSM
Function pw_getgroups() can be made to run faster.
Add support for NFSv4 (and POSIX) acls for CreateHome
mod_shaper calculates wrong (too big) delay time when resuming a file transfer
CPU consumption, slow transfer with mod_sftp
New module to look up useraliases from berkdb & co.
mod_shaper should calculate its shares based only on current data transfers, rather than current connections
ftpasswd insecurely change passwd content
Allow customizable error messages for <Limit>ed users
mod_ldap fails while searching Windows Active Directory from top level of domain
mod_ifsession should evaluate/handle conditional Include directives
Allow ExecBeforeCommand to fail a command if the script return value is non-zero
Add SNMP tables so per-instance stats can be tracked
Support mod_sql policy for disconnecting from database after authentication
Support for Kerberos/GSSAPI authentication in mod_sftp
Support ldapcompare for group membership enumeration
Broken filenames with filezilla
SFTP directory listings don't show "." and ".." in certain circumstances
Radius authentication fails with mod_sftp and FTP
Support dtrace probes in proftpd
LDAP support for mod_wrap2
Handle <IfUser> lines within <Directory> sections
Support LDAP binds requiring GSSAPI credentials
Support disabling of SSH rekeying for certain clients
On windows, proftpd saves ascii with LF instead of CRLF
Alter pr_syslog() to generate RFC 5424 based messages
ftptop: information are not formatted in columns

BUILD ERROR: "mod_auth.c", line 2530.45: 1506-226 (S) The ":" operator is not allowed between "char*" and "int".
Access denied post patching of Redhat Linux server which is hosted proftpd configuration.

Subsequent upload to existing file fails when UserOwner is used
Too many levels of symbolic links
.in. Files Not Cleaned Up Properly - HiddenStores

ProFTPD terminating (signal 11)
Performance issues/questions using TLSv1.3 FTPS
